author: brusale
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47859.
Fix `.21` failures due to `ProductNotFound` errors as explained at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47859#issuecomment-3051290758.

#### PR validation:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l 29634.21 -i all --ibeos
```
runs.

fyi @mmusich
title: fix `ProductNotFound` errors in ProdLike workflows
